body.name: UPPAbaby Alta High Back Booster Seat / Seven-Position, Active Support Headrest / SecureFit Integrated Belt Guide + Positioner / Removable Cup Holder Included / Jake (Black Mélange)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 22 hrs 23 mins
features: EFFECTIVENESS OF HIGH BACK: High-back boosters provide enhanced safety features by ensuring optimal body positioning that helps absorb impact and better protect the head and torso.
PROPER FIT EVERY TIME: Our unique SecureFit belt routing system with lap belt positioner ensures proper fit for the lap and shoulder belt while preventing submarining.
LOCK IN SECURITY: Rigid LATCH connectors secure the booster to the vehicle seat guaranteeing proper alignment and positioning for everyday use.
GROWS WITH THEM: The seven-position, Active Support Headrest accommodates growing children. The Alta is suitable for children from 40–100 lbs, and 38–57” in height.
ADDED HEAD PROTECTION: Specialized, energy-absorbing foams provide added Side Impact Protection.
SIDE IMPACT PODS: Positioned on the side of shell and always engaged, the Side Impact Pods absorb and disperse crash forces for added safety and protection.

INCLUDED CUP HOLDER: The spacious seat design paired with dual armrests, and removable cup holder provides added comfort for your child during the ride. The dishwasher safe cup holder can attach to either side of the seat for added convenience.
REMOVABLE, WASHABLE FABRICS: Messes happen! The removeable, washable fabrics on the Alta make it simple to clean and reattach. The seat base fabric zips right off for easy cleaning.

A CHEMICAL-FREE CHOICE: Keep baby safe from day one with our original fire retardant free fabric. These SafeTech fabrics on the Alta are not treated and contain no harmful chemicals anywhere on the seat.

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: Travel with confidence knowing your little one is in a safe & comfortable environment with our GREENGUARD Gold Certification. The Alta has been tested & proven to support healthier air quality & low chemical emissions.
body.description: The Alta 7 position active support headrest with secure fit, easily adjusts to ensure proper belt fit and positioning for your child while side impact pods on the shell provide advanced Side Impact protection. Rigid LATCH connection secures the seat to the vehicle for when not in use and aids in properly positioning the child in the seat. Included dishwasher safe cup holder make longer trips a breeze. Approximately: 5 - 10 years weight: 40 - 100 lbs height: 38" - 57"

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle with mild detergent. Do not bleach. Dry Flat and away from direct sunlight before re-use or storage. Do not iron or dry clean.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safety, elevated. Secure your child on the last phase of their car seat journey with the ALTA High-Back Belt Positioning Booster. From energetic elementary school kids to independent pre-teens, the ALTA delivers proper seat and belt positioning with style, comfort and ease. Specifications: Approximately 6 – 10 years old Weight: 40 – 100 lbs Height: 38” – 57”

Buckle up. Move on. The SecureFit belt routing system ensures a proper fit for lap and shoulder belts thanks to a big difference belt guides and a unique lap belt positioner. Grows with them The seven-position, Active Support Headrest accommodates growing children. Sit back and relax The spacious design paired with dual armrests provides added comfort for your child during the ride. A small feature that makes a big difference Specialized foams provide added side impact protection. Positioned on the side of shell, the side impact pods absorb and disperse crash forces.

Hydrate on the go and easily clean spills The ALTA includes a removable cup holder that can attach to either side of the seat. When spills happen, the seat base fabric quickly zips off for easy cleaning while being machine washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in every way
reviews.reviewText: We tried several boosters and this was the one we ended up with. Tried the Clek booster, Maxi Cosi, over priced Volvo booster, Graco, and Diono boosters. Diono was hard and too wide on top for three across. The top corners of the head rest made it very difficult to close the door in my 2020 xc90. Graco is narrow in the shoulder area. Liked the Clek booster but the seat has crazy hard cushion and the worse part was the height of the back of the seat. Height of the seat reached under my son’s mid back and the seat bottom was under his mid thigh. My son could not stand it. It’s very simple, sleek and stylish but maybe not the most comfortable for my son at least. Great rigid latch system on the Clek but my son literally asked me to send it back after our test ride in it. My son liked the Maxi Cosi. The cushion was very comfortable but like the Graco we tried, it restricted his arm movements as the shoulder width was narrow. The Volvo seat is not worth mentioning. What a piece of crap! Literally was like taking some hard plastic and covering in a few spots of leather. You might think that being expensive and a car with great safety specs, they might create an innovative and safe seat. Yeah, about that...Hard, uncomfortable, no latch, useless and over $400 for some piece of garbage. For us, the seats all fell short in one or another area.My 7 year old loves everything about this seat. Easy to use the rigid latch, color is nice, cushion is comfy and easy to clean (fabric zips off) no complaints. He has good arm space and his legs have good seat support underneath. Just happy to have finally found a good, comfortable booster seat without any extra complaints from my gremlin passengers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits great in our truck. Very easy to install. Secure and comfortable. We’re happy with the product and definitely recommend. The only thing we cannot use is the cup holder because it sticks too far out but not a big deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, well designed
reviews.reviewText: My grandson just switched from a baby seat and loved this seat from the moment he sat in it. He even took an afternoon snooze resting his head on the well designed side wings. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great purchase. Excellent safety rating, easy to install and my son says it's super comfy. Saw other reviews that commented on it being challenging with the seatbelt to buckle. I have a Land Rover and the seatbelt buckles easily. Put the cupholder on the inside side of the seat, otherwise it banks up right against the door. Great quality and functionality - easy to adjust to the right height for my son.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cup holder is flimsy
reviews.reviewText: Good seat. Wished it came with two cup holders and the position of the cup holder was different. Cup holder sticks out and is flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neoprene like seat - wide base
reviews.reviewText: Like Meghan Trainor said... It's all about the base! Haha!The seat has a wide base; yet fits in individual bench or bucket seating in car or van. Great for older kids who you would still like to ride in a booster seat with 'side wings' for head protection. My 7-year-old rides in this seat.Neoprene-type fabric (like a wet suit) for the seat is great for wiping off spills and crumbs and is removable by a zipper. Does not snag at all and the seat is very smooth. Great design!The cup holder is removable. Yay!I wish that the back of the seat had the option to be removed vs being one solid piece to increase the longevity of the product use due to age of the person sitting in the seat. However, the wide base and fabric ( I bought the black one) overrode the inability to have a removable back to the base, because I know it would hold up from the car seat being used and passed down from one kid to the next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, comfy for kid
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight. Not bulky. Looks great! Easy to install. Comfortable for my boy. He can easily buckle himself. We like the Lap clip that keeps the belt at the hips not riding up or down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I read reviews on every booster I could find, ordered a Britax and had to return it (flimsy!), and we are THRILLED with this one! Positives- bottom seat belt guide, wide side wings, extra impact pods, entire back moves up with headrest, keeps kids in a high back until height is reached for belt only, lovely teal color, zip removable seat cover, easy remove belt guide cover, no crevices to collect crumbs... and the rigid latch is an absolute game changer!! Seriously the easiest seat I’ve ever installed because of the rigid latch! The child loves it, too! My only negatives- can’t figure out how to remove back cover and cup holder won’t click into place, but I really didn’t spend that much time working on those things because they weren’t as important to me . I would buy it over again and recommend it a million times for the safety features and sturdiness!!
